comments: This is a sample configuration file for the VAMS v2.1 to v2.2 migration script.
Replace the placeholder values with your actual values before running the script.
The batch_size parameter controls how many items are processed in each batch.
Set dry_run to true to perform a test run without making any changes.
base_assets_prefix should end with a slash (/) for proper path construction.
asset_bucket_name is the name of the S3 bucket used for asset storage.
comment_storage_table_name is optional and used for migrating comments to reference current asset versions.
asset_links_table_name is the name of the old asset links table to migrate from.
asset_links_table_v2_name is the name of the new asset links v2 table to migrate to.
